content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel and iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel and copper ore input
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel and copper ore input

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles at positions (-9.5,18.5), (-5.5,18.5), (-1.5,18.5), (-10.5,15.5), (3.5,15.5), (1.5,17.5)

### Research Facility
- Lab conducting automation research
- Connected to the electrical network (ID: 3376)
- Currently processing automation science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Prerequisites Error
- Check technology prerequisites before starting research
- Automation research must be completed before Electronics research can begin

### Research Pack Management
- Ensure required research packs are crafted and available before starting research
- Keep track of research pack requirements for ongoing research

### Power System Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to maintain continuous power generation
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine

### Production Management
- Monitor fuel levels in furnaces to maintain continuous production
- Keep track of ore supplies to maintain continuous plate production
- Balance production between iron and copper based on needs
